product_name: Golden Fry Yorkshire Pudding and Pancake Mix OFFER 2 for £1
product_description:
Golden Fry Yorkshire Pudding and Pancake Mix

Makes 12 puddings in 30 minutes
No artificial flavours or preservatives

Preparation and Usage

For perfect Yorkshire Puddings every time, follow these simple steps:
Pre-heat the oven to 220°C/Fan 200°C/Gas Mark 7
Empty the contents into a mixing bowl, add 220ml of cold water and 2 medium eggs. Whisk thoroughly to form a smooth batter.
Add a little oil into each compartment of a 12 hole cupcake tray.
Place in the pre-heated oven and leave to heat until the oil is sizzling hot, between 5-10 minutes.
Confidently pour the batter evenly into the compartments and return to the oven.
Bake for 20-25 minutes (don’t open the oven door for the first 15 minutes) until well risen and golden.
Serve immediately for crisp well risen Yorkshire puddings.

Also perfect for Pancakes every time, follow these simple steps:
Empty the contents into a mixing bowl.
Add 250ml of cold water and 1 medium egg. Whisk thoroughly to form a smooth batter, then transfer to a jug.
Heat a little oil in a frying pan. Pour a little batter into the frying pan, enough to cover the base thinly and swirl around to coat the pan evenly. Cook until golden. Toss or flip the pancake over to cook the other side.
Serve when cooked, then add a drop more oil to the pan to cook the next pancake.

Tasty Tips to Try!
Try adding a handful of mixed fruit and a teaspoon of cinnamon to the batter before baking, serve with a drizzle of golden syrup and vanilla ice-cream.

Tropics Chip Sprinkle is a delicious American styled seasoning salt intended for chips, french fries, BBQs, burgers, and more! Consisting of Salt, Paprika, Dried Onion, Garlic Granules, Sugar, Smoked Paprika.  Make your chips adventurous again.

Tropical Sun peri peri seasoning 100g

A colourful blend of chilli, lemon, paprika, cumin and more, Tropical Sun Peri Peri Seasoning is famous as a flavouring for chicken, but is equally as delicious with potato wedges, meat and veg. Use as a dry rub or mixed with olive oil to create a wet marinade. You can even sprinkle it over freshly made popcorn for a spicy, delicious snack. Enjoy!

Tropical Sun oxtail seasoning 100g

Oxtail originally meant the tail of an ox but nowadays oxtail generally means beef tail. Braised oxtail is one of Jamaica's favourite dishes. Our carefully selected blend of spices and herbs will help you recreate the authentic taste of Jamaican oxtail. Enjoy!

Tropical Sun jollof seasoning 100g

A dish made with love, jollof rice is an icon of West African food and has become famous worldwide for its incredible depth of flavour. Where most rice dishes tend to be sides to the main meal, jollof is undoubtedly the star of the show. Smoky, spicy and fragrant, the dish is a celebration of West Africa’s culture of sharing. Nobody leaves Auntie’s house without a tupperware of jollof!

Whether you’re cooking jollof in a Ghanaian, Nigerian or Senegalese style – our expertly blended jollof seasoning will help you create the perfect dish. Serve with fried plantain for the ultimate sweet and savoury flavour combo!

Black pepper (Piper nigrum) is a flowering vine in the family Piperaceae, cultivated for its fruit, known as a peppercorn, which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning. When fresh and fully mature, the fruit is about 5 mm (0.20 in) in diameter and dark red, and contains a single seed, like all drupes.

When you think of pepper, you likely envision the black variety. In reality, black peppercorns are green peppercorns that have been cooked and dried out. Black pepper is most commonly used as a seasoning or crust that adds a robust spice to some of our favorite foods: meats, eggs, salads, fries, soups and more
Natco Coarse Black Pepper (300g) is a necessity for your home - pepper is the world's most popular spice! This is the coarsely ground version, but we also do finely ground and whole peppercorns.

The whole black pepper adds an extra level of spice to your dishes, but it can also be ground up into a nice, fine powder.
